Urgently we are looking for Field Marketing Executives - Female for our Vadapalani Office.

Note : The Job is mostly Field Marketing So Bike is Must

Company Overview:  
We are a reputable chemical company based in Vadapalani, Chennai, specializing in providing high-quality products to our clients. As part of our growth strategy, we are seeking dynamic and motivated individuals to join our marketing team as Marketing Executives.

Job Description:  
We are looking for enthusiastic Marketing Executives to join our team. As a Marketing Executive, you will be responsible for promoting our products to potential clients in the field. This role requires proactive individuals who are comfortable with fieldwork and are passionate about meeting sales targets.

Key Responsibilities:

Conducting market research to identify potential clients and market trends.  
Visiting clients and presenting our range of products.  
Providing samples to clients and demonstrating product features.  
Building and maintaining strong relationships with clients.  
Achieving sales targets set by the company.  
Keeping track of competitors' activities and market trends.  
Reporting on sales activities and market feedback to the management team.  
Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.  
Previous experience in sales or marketing preferred, but not mandatory.  
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.  
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.  
Must possess a valid bike license and own a bike for fieldwork.  
Proactive and target-driven mindset.  
Fluent in English and Tamil languages.

Benefits:

Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.  
Opportunity for career growth and development.  
Friendly and supportive work environment.  
Training provided on product knowledge and sales techniques.

title: Senior Architect
description:
**Exciting Opportunity: Sr. Sustainable Architect in Tall Building at Aesthetic Designs in Mumbai, India**

**Company:** Aesthetic Designs  
**Location:** Mumbai, India  
**Job Type:** Full-time  
**Experience:** Minimum 10 years

Are you passionate about shaping urban environments and creating vibrant street experiences? Aesthetic Designs, situated in the dynamic city of Mumbai, is a pioneering company that values the fusion of creativity, functionality, and urban aesthetics. We are actively seeking a Senior Cityscape and Street Scape Designer to join our team and contribute to crafting captivating cityscapes and enhancing tourism planning initiatives.

**About Us:**

Aesthetic Designs is at the forefront of innovation in urban design, placemaking, and tourism planning. Our work transcends traditional boundaries, weaving artistry and practicality to transform urban spaces into dynamic, immersive experiences. We are committed to shaping urban landscapes that reflect our rich cultural heritage and inspire future generations.

**Role and Responsibilities:**

Sustainable architects play a crucial role in designing and developing tall buildings that are environmentally responsible and energy-efficient. Their responsibilities encompass various aspects of the building's design, construction, and operation to ensure sustainability throughout the building's lifecycle. Here are some key responsibilities of sustainable architects for tall buildings:

Sustainable Design:Incorporate sustainable design principles from the initial concept phase, considering factors such as site selection, orientation, and building shape to maximize energy efficiency and minimize environmental impact.  
Employ passive design strategies, such as natural ventilation, daylighting, and shading, to reduce energy consumption and enhance occupant comfort.

Energy Efficiency:Specify energy-efficient building systems and materials to reduce energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions.  
Implement high-performance insulation, windows, and HVAC systems to optimize energy efficiency in a tall building's envelope.

Renewable Energy:Integrate renewable energy sources, such as solar panels or wind turbines, into the building's design to generate clean energy on-site.

Water Efficiency:Design water-efficient plumbing systems, fixtures, and landscaping to minimize water consumption.  
Explore rainwater harvesting and greywater recycling systems to reduce the demand for potable water.

Materials Selection:Choose sustainable, locally sourced, and low-impact building materials to reduce the environmental footprint of construction.  
Consider the life cycle assessment of materials to assess their long-term sustainability.

Green Certifications:Work towards achieving green building certifications like LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) or BREEAM (Building Research Establishment Environmental Assessment Method) to validate the sustainability of the design and construction.

Site Ecology:Integrate green spaces, urban farming, or green roofs into the building design to enhance biodiversity and improve air quality.  
Consider the impact of the building on the local ecosystem and mitigate any negative effects.

Adaptability and Resilience:Design buildings with flexibility and adaptability to accommodate changing needs and technologies over time.  
Consider climate resilience strategies to ensure the building can withstand extreme weather events and changing environmental conditions.

Lifecycle Analysis:Conduct life cycle assessments to evaluate the environmental impact of the building from construction through operation and eventual demolition or repurposing.

Education and Advocacy:Educate clients, stakeholders, and the public about the benefits of sustainable design and the long-term value it brings.  
Advocate for sustainable practices and policies within the construction industry and regulatory bodies.

Collaboration:Collaborate closely with engineers, builders, and other professionals to ensure that sustainable design goals are met during construction and operation.

Sustainable architects must balance the aesthetic and functional aspects of tall building design with a commitment to minimizing environmental impact, reducing resource consumption, and enhancing the well-being of occupants. Their role is pivotal in creating sustainable urban environments and addressing the challenges of climate change and urbanization.

**Qualifications:**

* A minimum of 7-10 years of experience in Tall Building
* Preferred qualifications include a Post Graduate Degree in Urban Planning or

equivalent.

Educational background such as an MBA or Two-year Postgraduate Diploma in Planning, or a Graduate Degree in Architecture (with valid Council Of Architecture registration).

* Additional Post Graduate Degree in Urban Design.

If you are a visionary professional with a passion for urban design and a desire to shape vibrant cityscapes, we invite you to join us in Mumbai, India. Contribute to Aesthetic Designs' journey of transforming urban spaces into captivating destinations. Apply now to be a part of our dynamic team.

Immediately Joining required.

Staying in Mumbai only can apply.

title: Sales Coordinator
description:
**Established in 2016, Southern Felt & Geotex** is one of the famous names in the market. We are working as a **Sole Proprietorship** based firm. Location of our firm is **Chennai**, **Tamil** **Nadu**. Enriched by our vast industrial experience in this business, we are involved in **manufacturing** an enormous quality range of **Wool Felt Sheet, Air Filter Sheet, Wool Felt Strip** and many more

**Location: Nungambakkam & Guindy**

**Working Days: Monday to Saturday**

**Job Description:**

We are currently seeking a **Sales Coordinator** with a background in textiles industry and preferably **3 years** of experience to join our dynamic sales team. The Sales Coordinator will play a key role in supporting the sales department by coordinating activities, managing communication between internal teams and customers, and providing administrative support to ensure smooth operations.

**Roles and Responsibilities:**

Assist the sales team in managing customer inquiries, orders, and requests in a timely and professional manner.

Coordinate with internal departments such as production, logistics, and finance to ensure timely delivery of products and services to customers.

Prepare and process sales orders, quotations, and invoices accurately and efficiently.

Maintain and update sales and customer databases, ensuring data accuracy and integrity.

Monitor sales performance metrics and prepare reports for management review.

Communicate with customers via phone, email, and in-person meetings to address inquiries, resolve issues, and provide product information.

Assist in the coordination of sales events, trade shows, and promotional activities as needed.

Provide administrative support to the sales team, including scheduling appointments, preparing meeting materials, and organizing travel arrangements.

Stay informed about industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to identify sales opportunities and threats.

Can do the collection of payments with the clients and maintaining the records.

**Qualifications:**

Bachelor's degree in any specialization is must.

Background in textiles or related industry preferred.

Minimum of 3 years of experience in sales coordination or administrative support role.

Strong organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and relationships with customers and internal teams.

Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, ) and CRM software.

Detail-oriented with a high level of accuracy in data entry and record-keeping.

Ability to work independently as well as part of a team, with a positive attitude and willingness to learn.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹20,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per month

Shift:

* Day shift
* Morning shift

Supplemental pay types:

* Performance bonus
* Yearly bonus

Travel requirement:

* Travel

Application Question(s):

* What languages do you speak?
* Are you comfortable in using CRM tools and Microsoft Excel?
* Please share 3 reasons why sales is the most important function of an organisation?

Education:

* Diploma (Preferred)

Experience:

* Sales: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

description:
JOB LOCATION : UNITED KINGDOM/ NORTHERN IRELAND

* Relevant Degree or diploma
* At least 2 years of clinical experience
* Valid HCPC Registration/ Willing to Apply
* Passed IELTS/OET

Providing expert dietary advice and support to patients with a wide range of medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, gastrointestinal disorders, cancer, kidney disease, and malnutrition. Assess patients' nutritional needs, develop personalized nutrition plans, and monitor their progress to ensure optimal outcomes.

* Providing nutritional support to patients who are unable to eat normally due to medical conditions or treatments. This may involve prescribing specialized liquid feeds, enteral (tube) feeding, or parenteral (intravenous) nutrition to meet patients' nutritional requirements.
* Providing health advice and promoting healthy eating, advising about special diets, educating health professionals and the public about nutrition, establishing and addressing health needs, helping to facilitate dietary changes.

title: Data Control Associate II
description:
**Position Type :**

Full time**Type Of Hire :**

Experienced (relevant combo of work and education)**Education Desired :**

General Equivalency Diploma**Travel Percentage :**

0%GENERAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES • Identifies errors in calculations and balances and make corrections. • Receives and prepares physical documents for delivery to the sorting department. • Performs online reject-repair using a CRT and physical documents. • Physically repairs rejects. • Prepares transit cash letters. • Prepares and dispatches client statements and adjustments as needed. • Prepares cash letter of return items. • Performs data entry on an input device/application. • Reconciles and properly documents all out of proof conditions. • Compares work product with word standards for accuracy. • Other related duties assigned as needed. EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS High school diploma or GED GENERAL KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES • Capacity to lift or move up to 30 pounds • Proficient written and oral communication skills in dealing with employees or external customers/clients • Knowledge of procedures used to segregate and distribute output • Knowledge of balancing and correction procedures • Proficient in entering data into various PC software packages • Proficient in classifying computer output • Knowledge to operate a computer effectively and utilize software packages required by the position • Proficiency to encode 1,000-1,500 items per hour FIS JOB LEVEL DESCRIPTION Developing support role. Moderate skills with high level of proficiency. Has complete understanding of data control department. May coach junior technical staff. Works under general supervision with latitude for independent judgment. May consult with senior peers on more complex issues. Typically requires a minimum of two or more years of data control/encoding experience with at least one year as a Data Control Associate I.**Privacy Statement**


FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. For specific information on how FIS protects personal information online, please see the Online Privacy Notice.

**Sourcing Model**


Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies. FIS does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies which are not on the preferred supplier list and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, our employees, or any other part of our company.
